title: STEAM-PBL-Based Engineering Problem-Solving Skill Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Engineering Approach Training for General Citizens to Solve Social Issues

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% proficiency in systematically analyzing real-world engineering problems and solving them using the STEM-PBL framework
Acquire skills to visualize and interpret engineering data using smartphone-based digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra)
Complete three or more projects creatively solving complex engineering problems through team-based collaboration

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
